welcome_message_body: Welcome to Centennial, where the charm of small-town America meets the excitement of a bustling city. Known for its beautiful parks, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Jabo's Bar-Be-Q
restaurants.description: Jabo's Bar-Be-Q is a bbq joint located in Greenwood Village.
restaurants.address: 9682 E Arapahoe Rd (at S Dayton St), Greenwood Village, CO 80112

restaurants.name: Bawarchi Denver
restaurants.description: Bawarchi Denver is a south indian restaurant located in Centennial.

restaurants.name: Fourleaf Chopped Salads
restaurants.description: Fourleaf Chopped Salads is a salad restaurant located in Greenwood Village.
restaurants.address: 6840 S Dallas Way (East Costilla Avenue), Greenwood Village, CO 80112

restaurants.name: Chick-fil-A
restaurants.description: Chick-fil-A is a fast food restaurant located in Greenwood Village.
restaurants.address: 9331 E Arapahoe Rd, Greenwood Village, CO 80112

restaurants.name: Pho Lee
restaurants.description: Pho Lee is a vietnamese restaurant located in Greenwood Village.
restaurants.address: 6860 S Clinton St, Greenwood Village, CO 80112

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport handles all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport caters to private and charter flights, with exclusive lounges and services for VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Jeffco Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
